content: MQK-41-R Bracket Stainless steel (A4) C-Channel bracket for medium-duty applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features C-profile with serrated edges – for higher pull-out and shear capacity Engineered for higher shear load capacity and easier assembly Rectangular base plate – strengthens the connection to the supporting material and increases rigidity Pre-marked dimensions – for quicker installation, assembly and measurement Single channel, slotted Applications Stand-alone use on ceilings, walls and floors or in conjunction with strut channel systems Installation in industrial atmospheres or areas with high levels of condensation Installing cable trays, air ducts and pipe supports Recommended for use in corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material thickness: Channel: 2 mm, baseplate: 8 mm Material composition: Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Technical Data | Material thickness | Channel: 2 mm, baseplate: 8 mm | Material composition | Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) | Profile | MQ-41-R ### ITEMS- 304007 - Bracket MQK-41/600-R SS316 - Package Size 8 pc
